name: SetEntityCoords
description: Sets the position of an entity in 3D space. For player entities, this will teleport the player to the specified coordinates.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The new position coordinates (created with vec3())

returns.description: This function does not return a value

example:
-- Teleport player to spawn point
AddEventListener("onPlayerJoin", function(player)
    local entity = GetPlayerEntity(player)
    SetEntityCoords(entity, vec3(0, 10, 0))
end)

-- Move player in a thread
CreateThread(function()
    local entity = GetPlayerEntity(somePlayer)
    for i = 1, 10 do
        SetEntityCoords(entity, vec3(i, 2, 0))
        Wait(1000)
    end
end)
notes: For players, this triggers a client-side teleport
Position updates are sent to all connected clients
Y coordinate should be above ground level to avoid clipping
Entity must be assigned to a world before positioning
